mapper.select: select r.board_id, b.content ,b.user_id ,count(r.user_id) as count from board b inner join report r on b.id = r.board_id where b.is_deleted=0 and r.status=1 group by b.content, r.board_id, b.user_id order by count desc
select * from report where board_id= #{board_id} and status=1
select id, title, content,user_id from board where id= #{board_id}
mapper.update: update board b set is_deleted = 1 where b.id = #{id}
update report r set status = 0 where r.board_id = #{id}
